item.title: After years of Russian denials, court accidentally admits Black Sea battleship was sunk by Ukraine - CNN
item.description: After years of Russian denials, court accidentally admits Black Sea battleship was sunk by Ukraine CNNBattleship in court. Deleted court statement acknowledges cruiser Moskva was hit by missiles and reveals casualty figures en.zona.mediaRussian Court Demands $29 Million from Ukrainian Navy Officer for Sinking of Moskva Missile Cruiser - Militarnyi MilitarnyiMilitary Court Admits Ukrainian Missile Strike Sank Moskva Cruiser themoscowtimes.comAnd finally…

item.title: Could trilateral talks yield a breakthrough in Ukraine-Russia war?
item.description: It’s the first time representatives from Kyiv, Moscow and Washington have come together since the full-scale invasion of Ukraine in 2022.

item.title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 1,433
item.description: These are the key developments from day 1,433 of Russia’s war on Ukraine.

item.title: Zelenskyy touts ‘constructive’ trilateral talks between the US, Russia and Ukraine in Abu Dhabi
item.description: Ukraine's Zelenskyy calls recent US-Russia-Ukraine talks in Abu Dhabi "constructive," marking potential breakthrough in diplomatic efforts to end the war.
